directions: Bring a large pot of water to a boil; add potatoes, sausages, onions, corn, and seafood seasoning. Cook mixture at a boil until the potatoes are cooked through, about 30 minutes.
Gently drop crabs into the boiling mixture; cook until the crabmeat is cooked through, at least 10 minutes. Drain water.
ingredients: 2 ears fresh corn, cut into halves
1/2 cup seafood seasoning (such as Old Bay®), or to taste
title: Crab Boil
